attributes.action: Petition government to provide free feminine products to women in the UK
attributes.additional_details: Women have a need to have these products for their health and wellbeing and many can not afford it.   This products are not a luxury but essential.
attributes.background: I believe the UK government shall follow the new law in Scotland to provide women whom require it, free feminine products.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/618799
